msbt.message: This is the Year of the Mouse, so I need to make the most of it!Though I have to admit that I don't remember much from the last one, twelve years ago,
I feel like I'm in the spotlight now, because it's the Year of the Cow.Please don't make a big deal about this, , OK?
This may be the Year of the Tiger, but you should know I'm still here for you, .
You might know this already, but this is the Year of the Rabbit! I guess it's my year, then? , I'm honestly not sure how to feel about any of it.
This only comes every twelve years, but it's another Year of the Horse.I feel like I'm under pressure to do something important for "my year."
This is sort of my year, because it's the Year of the SheepBut really, I want this to be a great year for everyone on the island.
So this is the Year of the Monkey! I'm not really comfortable with having a year based on me
It's my year again, Year of the Bird, but should I be excited about that? I mostly just think it's kinda funny.
Guess what year it is? That's right, it's the Year of the Dog! But you don't have to make a big deal of it.
This year I'm going to try to catch up on all those projects I've been meaning to do!I'm not sure how I fell so far behind, but I'm going to stick it out all year and try for an unexpected comeback!
